1.0.1.name: wordpress/no-ie-upgrade-reminder-widget
1.0.1.description: This plugin gives you the ability to display a widget to your visitors that use IE6 (and optionally IE7), reminding them to upgrade their browser! It can display a link to download the current versions of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Opera, or Internet Explorer — entirely up to you which of the five are offered to the user, and whether the order is randomized on each page load.
